summary: A reflection/journaling app called Veil with three emotional modes (Happy, Confess, Broke) for post creation. Each mode has specific UI guidance text and tonal qualities. Public posts in Broke mode automatically display a subtle safety footer.
architectural_notes: Three emotional modes: HAPPY (warm/grounded), CONFESS (gentle/witnessing), BROKE (vulnerable/honest)
Safety footer must be visually subtle and only appear on PUBLIC + BROKE posts

existing_features.title: In the PostCreationPage, when the user selects the HAPPY emotion mode, display the guidance text: "Share something real, not something impressive." The UI surrounding this guidance and the post creation form should adopt a warm, grounded, quietly celebratory tone — achieved through soft warm color accents (e.g., amber/golden hues), gentle typography weight, and calm spacing.

In the PostCreationPage, when the user selects the CONFESS emotion mode, display the guidance text: "This space is for release, not applause." The UI should adopt a gentle, human, witnessing tone — soft neutral/muted tones, quiet typography, no bright or celebratory accents.

In the PostCreationPage, when the user selects the BROKE emotion mode, display the guidance text: "Share what feels true right now. You don't have to explain everything." The UI should adopt a tone that is grounded and non-pressuring — subdued, low-contrast color treatment that feels safe and unhurried.

In the PostCreationPage, when the selected emotion mode is BROKE and visibility is set to PUBLIC, automatically display a subtle footer beneath the post creation form with the exact text: "Veil is a reflection space. If you are in immediate danger, please contact local emergency services." This footer must be visually subtle — small font size, muted/low-opacity text color, no bold or alarming styling. It must not appear for BROKE+PRIVATE, or for any other emotion mode regardless of visibility.

new_feature_requests.summary: Emotional mode guidance: show contextual guidance text and apply tonal UI for Happy, Confess, and Broke modes
Auto-add subtle safety footer on PUBLIC + BROKE posts: 'Veil is a reflection space. If you are in immediate danger, please contact local emergency services.'
